mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (item_id, write_date_time, content, img_url, member_id, title, question_type, answer_status) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{writeDateTime}, #{content}, #{imgUrl}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{questionType}, #{answerStatus})
INSERT INTO question_answer (question_id, write_date_time, admin_id, content, title) VALUES (#{questionId}, NOW(), #{adminId}, #{content}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question_answer WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.update: update question set answer_status = 'COMPLETE' where question_id = #{questionId}
update question set answer_status = 'WAITING' where question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.select: SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.write_date_time AS writeDateTime, q.title, q.content, q.img_url AS imgUrl, q.member_id AS memberId, q.question_type AS questionType, q.answer_status AS answerStatus, q.item_id AS itemId, qa.question_id as answerQuestionId, qa.question_answer_id as questionAnswerId, qa.write_date_time as answerWriteDateTime, qa.admin_id as adminId, qa.title as answerTitle, qa.content as answerContent FROM question q LEFT JOIN question_answer qa ON qa.question_id = q.question_id WHERE q.item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.write_date_time AS writeDateTime, q.title, q.member_id AS memberId, q.answer_status AS answerStatus, q.item_id AS itemId FROM question q WHERE q.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT q.question_id AS questionId, q.write_date_time AS writeDateTime, q.title, q.content, q.img_url AS imgUrl, q.member_id AS memberId, q.question_type AS questionType, q.answer_status AS answerStatus, q.item_id AS itemId, qa.question_id as answerQuestionId, qa.question_answer_id as questionAnswerId, qa.write_date_time as answerWriteDateTime, qa.admin_id as adminId, qa.title as answerTitle, qa.content as answerContent FROM question q LEFT JOIN question_answer qa ON qa.question_id = q.question_id WHERE q.question_id = #{questionId}
